description: Communities are aware of their vulnerabilities, and adequately prepared to manage (and reduce) disaster and environmental related risks

subproject.description: Strengthen urban local bodies to undertake vulnerability analysis, improve enforcement capacities to promote safe development, develop community capacities in selct cities to undertake urban risk management activities
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Urban Risk Reduction
